overview: William Poster writes a gossip column for the Morning Gazette. He will write about anyone and everyone as long as he gets the credit. He gets most of his information from his showgirl gal-pal, Peggy.  Eventually Bill's reckless tattling gets him in deep trouble with friends and enemies, putting his career and life in jeopardy.
tagline: You'll love and hate Mrs. Poster's little boy Will'yum...and walk out of the theater chirping
title: Is My Face Red?
